group_1.textLeft: Phew...

group_1.textRight: How's the Mirrors Witch doin'?

group_1.textLeft: It's no wonder the Kamihama girls have so much trouble with it. It's such a complex and strange labyrinth.

group_1.textRight: The ones unchosen by the [textYellow:Kimochi] are lookin' for it,
but it feels like it's gonna take a lil longer...

group_1.textLeft: I have no doubt that we've nearly reached@the deepest part of it, though.

group_1.textRight: But the Union's gonna get here soon, ain't they...?

group_1.textLeft: I did score an "insurance run" on Felicia Mitsuki,
so I'm sure she'll buy us the time we need...

group_1.textRight: Speaking of, we went and gave Rena Minami a shakedown,
but I can't really say it went either way...

group_1.textLeft: That's a rare reaction.

group_1.textRight: Mmm...I dunno... She just doesn't seem the type@to lose her fightin' spirit.
She snapped 'n blew up after her emotions went@all haywire,
prolly more the type to fall into self-loathing.

group_1.textLeft: Heh, you got that right.
Rena's an absolute pain in the ass.@I'm the same way.

group_1.textRight: Anyways, how's the little sister doin'?

group_1.textLeft: We've been calling her, but she's hardly respondin'...
...I wonder if she's nearly reached her limit.

group_1.textRight: I'm doing just fine.

group_1.textLeft: You may be strong physically,@but if you get attacked mentally againー
Whaー

group_1.textRight: I wasn't being serious～
But look, I've conquered my fear, haven't I?
Teehee.

group_1.textCenter: (All that talk of the east and west spread faster@than I thought...)
(It's a damn shame she had to go 'n get dragged into@this...)

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhiteSlow2]fumuu...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2]fumumu!

group_1.textRight: Urgh...phew...
Am I glad I got to be adjusted right before a big fight.

group_1.textLeft: fumumumu, funmunmufumumu fumunmu!

group_1.textRight: I don't know what you're saying.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry for using you as a practice partner,@so she says.

group_1.textRight: The results are all the same, so I'm fine with it.
Being a part of Promised Blood sure is physically@demanding...

group_1.textLeft: fumumu, fumummunmumu.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's keep that between us.

group_1.textRight: fummu fumumummu?

group_1.textLeft: Given her circumstances,@she should not have said that just now.
Answering in reverse to her position in this service@is also an act of kindness.
But if there were any useful information@for Urara here,
it'd be askin' what Kagome Satori is up to.
That oughta be interestin', yea?

group_1.textRight: That's supposed to be useful information?

group_1.textLeft: I don't think it's the kinda info that Promised Blood's interested in, though.

group_1.textRight: Uhh, I don't get what this is about,@but now I'm itching to go ask her...

group_1.textCenter: I don't deserve to be with you guys...

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:"I'm busy with this draft right now,@so we can do this later!"]
[textBlack: "In my next manga, Alina-senpai@ suddenly wakes up with a BANG,@and her memory is restored.@I'm aiming to make this@my best manga yet!"]
[textBlack:  "...Ah, it's a manga,@but it's not like an ordinary manga,@it's more like a plan I thought up."]

[textBlack:  "If this plan succeeds, Alina-senpai@  could become an ally@  of righteousness@and end up back at an even zero.@So I'm totally making her read it@and getting her to act it out@the way I think it will!"]

[textBlack:  "It's true that everyone sees@  Alina-senpai as a bad person@  that tried to destroy Kamihama,@but from my point of view,@Alina-senpai hasn't been able to@limit her pursuit of beauty,@so much to the point that@she just can't stop herself!"]
[textBlack:  "So if I can properly remind her@of the difference between@good and evil, I'm sure she'll@go back to being a wonderful artist!"]
[textBlack:  "So, if there is something I'd desire...@  She's blunt,@her thoughts are a total mystery,@sometimes she's a bit scary,@and I don't always get@what she's saying, but..."]
[textBlack:  "That cool girl@that makes me gasp in surprise@with her inspirational words...@I want Alina-senpai to come back..."]
